about:
I am a passionate full stack developer with expereince in IT and interest in Cyber Security. I am a Champlain Regional College graduate with a 3 year computer science D.E.C.
 
 My hobbies include Photography, music and videography. With these hobbies it truly allows my brain to stimulate a creative side within myself that translates into my work life and coding projects.
 I also take my fitness very seriously as a beleieve in an ideal work life balance and routine.
